api_list.name: price-feed
api_list.description: get the feed for top 10 cryptos on coinmarketcap.com
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-price-feed.p.rapidapi.com/api/crypto-feed"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-price-feed.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-price-feed.p.rapidapi.com/api/crypto-feed"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-price-feed.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
